channel.title: CVE Feed for sevenspark -- Menu Swapper
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sevenspark -- Menu Swapper

item.title: CVE-2020-36746|2024-08-04T17:37:06.704Z -- sevenspark -- menu%20swapper
item.description: The Menu Swapper plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.1.0.2. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the mswp_save_meta() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save meta data via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
